hero.title: Regulatory and Compliance
hero.subtitle: Maintaining the Highest Standards of Integrity, Transparency, and Compliance

policy.title: Compliance Policy Statement
policy.description: Arcadia Fund Management Group Asia Limited Asia Limited is committed to maintaining the highest standards of integrity, transparency, and compliance in all its business activities. As an asset management institution licensed by the Securities and Futures Commission (SFC) of Hong Kong, we have established a comprehensive compliance policy framework to ensure full adherence to local and international financial regulatory requirements.

sfc.title: SFC License
sfc.description: Licensed by the Hong Kong Securities and Futures Commission

kyc.title: Customer Due Diligence and Anti-Money Laundering Mechanisms
kyc.description: We implement strict customer identification and risk rating procedures to identify beneficiaries, sources of funds, and customer transaction behaviors, preventing money laundering, fraud, and terrorist financing.

marketAbuse.title: Insider Information and Market Manipulation Prevention Policies
marketAbuse.description: Employees are strictly prohibited from trading on non-public information; the company has pre-trade reporting systems and blacklist management mechanisms.

conflict.title: Conflict of Interest Identification and Management Mechanisms
conflict.description: We identify and record any potential conflicts of interest that may affect clients or the company and manage them appropriately through disclosure, segregation, or exemption.

riskControl.title: Investment Restrictions and Risk Limit Controls
riskControl.description: The company sets portfolio concentration limits, liquidity constraints, and counterparty exposure caps to operate within predefined risk tolerance levels.

training.title: Employee Compliance Training and Ethical Standards Code
training.description: All employees must regularly undergo compliance training on regulatory updates, ethical conduct, data confidentiality, and sign internal codes of conduct.

cco.title: Chief Compliance Officer System and Internal Audits
cco.description: We have appointed a dedicated Chief Compliance Officer independent of investment and sales functions, who reports compliance status regularly to the board and regulators.

activities.title: Regulated Activities Categories
